How It Works

Step 1

Choose your connectivity location & service.

Step 2

Order online.

Step 3

Service delivered in 15 days.

Simple Configuration and Online Ordering

  • Identify route online, select products, and order â€“ all from one website.
  • Configuration done within minutes with simple point‑and‑click location features.
  • Ordering service is easy. An order form can be completed in just a few steps.

No‑term Contracts and Zone‑Driven Pricing

  • Month‑to‑month orders.
  • Consistent and competitive pricing that is zone-driven.
  • Transparency. No need to call multiple salespeople to get a competitive quote.
  • Agree to 12 month term and NRC is waived.

Rapid Deployment

  • Services are delivered within 15 days (or 30 days for 100GB services).
